message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is a fair price for the quality of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $110.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
